summary.span: Provides a uniform way to evaluate device capabilities.

span.span: Provides a uniform way to evaluate device capabilities.

summary.span: This method is used internally by ASP.NET to implement various device-selection criteria expressed in the syntax of the controls.

span.span: This method is used internally by ASP.NET to implement various device-selection criteria expressed in the syntax of the controls.

summary.span: For example, this method is used to choose among [<Choice> Element (.NET Framework Developer's Guide)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) elements in a DeviceSpecific/Choice construct.

span.span: For example, this method is used to choose among [<Choice> Element (.NET Framework Developer's Guide)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) elements in a DeviceSpecific/Choice construct.

returns.span: if the device has the specified capability; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Anwendungen können die Methode, programmgesteuert auf, wenn sie Geräte-spezifischer Informationen sammeln.Applications can use the method programmatically when they gather device-specific information. Wenn die `capabilityName` Parameter gibt eine Auswertungsmethode Gerät die `optionalArgument` Parameter an diese Methode übergeben wird.If the `capabilityName` parameter specifies a device evaluation method, the `optionalArgument` parameter is passed to this method. Wenn die `capabilityName` Parameter gibt einen Eigenschaftsnamen oder ein Element im Funktionswörterbuch der Methode überprüft, ob die Eigenschaft oder ein Element entspricht der `optionalArgument` Parameter.If the `capabilityName` parameter specifies a property name or item in the capabilities dictionary, the method checks whether the property or item is equal to the `optionalArgument` parameter.

exception.span: A parameter is not found as a device-filter name specified in the configuration file, as a property, or as an item in the Item collection.

span.span: A parameter is not found as a device-filter name specified in the configuration file, as a property, or as an item in the Item collection.
